oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Egypt. Maṣlaḥat al-Misāḥah
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Map of Cairo published by the Survey of Egypt. Revised in 1927, first edition in 1930. Sheet 81/630. Location labels are in Arabic, while reference is in both English and Arabic. Map contains markings and text in red, blue, and green which were added by an unknown person. The writing discusses canals and drainage proposals in the area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cairo (Egypt) -- Maps;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; the American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is in the public domain.
